posts.post_content:
Anticipating the surge in demands for PSA slabs as a result of their temporary closure for submissions, I am offering the following cards for sale at this time.
I am requesting payment by check, money order or wire.

If I had used a listing for these same cards ten years ago at market value, they would be sold here on BST today, in roughly thirty-seven seconds, but that is not the case.

Pricing in this listing is based on current market value.  If the prices seem too high, wait a week or two.  If they still seem too high, wait a month or two.  In the unlikely event that they still seem too high, wait a year.

But why, ten years from now you will patting yourself on the back for taking advantage of these remarkable slabs (with the cards included), that will seem like bargains in retrospect.

1.  Harry Bay - Piedmont 350 - VG 3 - Southern League card

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/33540/bay-sl[/IMG]

     Asking $2700

2.  Bill Clancy - Sweet Cap 350 NY - VG+ 3.5 

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/13462/clancy[/IMG]

     Asking $910

3.  Paul Davidson - Piedmont 350 - EX 5

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10356/davidson[/IMG]

     Asking $1800

4.  Jerry Downs - Piedmont 350 - EX 5

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/49890/downs[/IMG]

     Asking $2160.    SOLD

5.  John Hummel - Sovereign 460 - EX-MT 6

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/45516/hummel-sov-460[/IMG]

     Asking $6910

6.  Harry Lumley - Piedmont 150 - EX-MT 6(MC)

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/19398/lumley[/IMG]

     Asking $2020

7.  Orval Overall (Portrait) - Piedmont 150 - VG 3

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10487/overall-portrait[/IMG]

     Asking $1080     SOLD

8.  Charles Seitz - Piedmont 350 - VG-EX 4 - Southern League Card.

     [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/54577/seitz-sl[/IMG]

     Asking $4270.   SOLD

Please do not tell anyone at PWCC about this listing.  If these start flying off my shelf, I will have to raise the prices.

This listing is serious and that is why I am posting it today, rather than tomorrow.

I'm looking forward to hearing from you.
Great cards Frank.  "If I had the funds I would be all over these."
Would you take $40k for the whole lot?

[quote name="hammertime" post=2087886]Would you take $40k for the whole lot?[/QUOTE]

If you pay for the postage.

[quote name="frankbmd" post=2087893]If you pay for the postage.[/QUOTE]Makes me think of JollyElms dictionary!

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-G930A using Tapatalk

I have a boatload of these Frank, they'll be worth more in ten years too.  Deal?
_

Midnight ET begins massive discounts  on these cards.  Yes, your eye’s do not deceive you.  90% off April 1st only on all cards except the Overall Portrait

To calculate 90% off either

1.  Remove the last zero from the listed price or,

2.  Move the decimal point one column to the left.

If you don’t see a decimal point, find one and put it in front of the zero that you didn’t remove.

If this is too complicated, move on to another thread.

Two members have expressed interest in the Overall Card.  The reduced price is $108 for this card.  I am asking both members to place a bid greater than $108.  High bid wins, but the winner will pay only one dollar more than the losing bid.
Good luck to both of you.
I'll take seitz and downs, pm coming

The Overall situation has been resolved.

5 cards remain.  At Midnight ET today the 90% discount is scheduled to end.
is bidding on the overall open to all or only the two guys who showed 1st interest?
If I want to pay full price can I?  Also, do you accept gratuities?

OVERALL good prices. 

What a steal Frank.

0 minutes remain.

Today’s prices are tomorrow’s memories.;)
